definitions.definition: A major East European river which flows south through Russia , Belarus and Ukraine into the Black Sea .
A city , a municipal and regional administrative centre , as well as, a raion , an urban hromada of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, Ukraine , on the Dnieper .
Clipping of Dnipropetrovs'k , an oblast of Ukraine .

main_definition: ( with the ) A major East European river which flows south through Russia , Belarus and Ukraine into the Black Sea .
secondary_definitions: A city , a municipal and regional administrative centre , as well as, a raion , an urban hromada of Dnipropetrovsk Oblast, Ukraine , on the Dnieper .
